plugins.name: Carregar Tabloide de Produtos - St. Marche
plugins.description: This plugin fetches product data from a JSON API and dynamically displays them within the interface. It processes the retrieved information, ensuring that each product is presented following the existing card style of the application. Additionally, the plugin maintains visual consistency by adapting product details such as name, price, and image to fit seamlessly into the predefined layout. This approach simplifies integration with various data sources, providing a uniform and cohesive user experience.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Product Integration – Fetch, Style, and Display with Ease.

This approach simplifies integration with various data sources, providing a uniform and cohesive user experience.

plugins.name: Applink
plugins.description: Applink is a simple yet effective plugin that enhances collaboration in Figma by allowing users to copy and share local URLs instead of the standard Figma.com links. This ensures seamless navigation directly from the Figma app to the app, eliminating the detour through a browser. Perfect for teams, Applink streamlines the sharing process by saving time and simplifying workflows.
plugins.tagline: Effortless link sharing, straight from app to app

plugins.name: Session Marker
plugins.description:
Session Maker Like in the Skate video game series. Leave a work space and return without bounds. In my personal workflow I noticed that being able to navigate to a single component from a instance wasn't enough and often left me forgetting where i came from.


UI updates planned early 25" - This is a initial release for testing and feedback

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

113549.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
113549.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: Figma2mos.
plugins.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
plugins.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

105007.name: Figma2mos.
105007.description:
Translate your mobile Figma designs into an executable layout for the Mobility Suite (mos.). Mobile frames created in Figma can be translated in their entirety, and individual Figma elements can be edited to suit mos. In addition, ready-made templates can be created for individual mos.-layers and used in the Figma editor to build your design. You can find a Quick Start Guide and Test Designs in the attached Playground-File.

For more information about mos. visit: https://mobilitysuite.de/
105007.tagline: Create, translate, and edit mobile Figma designs to export an executable layout for mos.

plugins.name: Multiclip
plugins.description:
✨ What's New in v1.0

✅ Copy multiple text elements anywhere in Figma.

✅ Select entire sections or frames to copy all text elements at once.

✅ Saved items remain available even after closing the plugin.

✅ Copy previous text to clipboard when replacing.

✅ Quickly paste saved text into selected text layers or create a new text node if none is selected.

✅ Easily remove all stored items when needed.

✅ A clean and simple interface for managing copied text efficiently.


🛠 How It Works

✅ Select text layers and click "Copy" to add them to your clipboard.

✅ Manage clipboard history (up to 10 items).

✅ Click "Paste" to insert saved text into selected text layers.


📌 Upcoming Features

🔹 Copy, save, and images or illustrations to clipboard.

🔹 Categorize copied items.

🔹 Custom paste settings.
plugins.tagline: Copy multiple texts to clipboard seamlessly

plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

135826.name: FlipArabic
135826.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com

networkAccess.reasoning: Access to the translation proxy server for translations

135826.release_notes:
- Smarter layer detection for skips - only skips elements when the entire name contains skip words (no more accidentally skipping "Logo Colored" or "Icon/Text")
- Better handling of grid layouts with wrapping
- Fixed stacking order issues in overlapping elements
- Increased capacity to handle up to 3,000 elements
- Faster, clearer progress notifications
- Components with "df" keyword will not be detached
135826.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

plugins.name: Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered) - Beta
plugins.description:
🏰 พ่อขุนเช็ก - ตัวช่วยเช็กภาษาไทยสุดแม่น ที่ทำให้การทำงานง่าย สนุก และดูโปรฯ กว่าเดิม!


✨ จุดเด่นของพ่อขุนเช็ก

* เช็กภาษาไทยแม่นยำระดับโปร : ใช้ AI ตรวจสอบการสะกดและบริบทไทยแบบละเอียด ครบทุกจุด

* สรุปผลไว สนุก และเข้าใจง่าย : ระบบให้คะแนนพร้อมแนะนำแบบเข้าใจง่าย สนุก เหมือนมีพ่อขุนรามคำแหงมาคอยติวส่วนตัว

* ใช้งานง่ายในคลิกเดียว : เลือกเฟรม/ข้อความ แล้วคลิกเดียวจบ ไม่ต้องเสียเวลาย้ายแพลตฟอร์ม

* ประหยัดเวลาทำงานจริง : ไม่ต้องเช็กทีละคำ ตรวจจบในรอบเดียว พร้อมใช้งานทันที


🎯 เหมาะกับใคร

* UX Writer สาย Copy ไทย

* ทีม Marketing ที่สร้าง Content ไทย

* Designer/ทีม Product ที่ต้องการงานไทยไร้ที่ติใน Figma


🚀 เริ่มใช้งานง่ายสุด ๆ

1. เลือกข้อความที่ต้องการเช็ก

2. เปิด Plugin “Thai Spell Checker - พ่อขุนเช็ก (AI Powered)” ใน Figma

3. รับผลตรวจและคำแนะนำทันที! ทำให้การเช็กภาษาไทยไม่ใช่เรื่องน่าเบื่ออีกต่อไป


เพียงคลิกเดียว งานภาษาไทยของคุณจะไร้ที่ติ ดูมืออาชีพ และประหยัดเวลากว่าที่เคย!
plugins.tagline: เช็คการสะกดภาษาไทยด้วย AI แบบสนุกๆ สไตล์พ่อขุนรามคำแหง พร้อมให้คะแนนแบบโบราณ

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

133539.name: Hints
133539.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access Alibaba Cloud for AI naming, and the Qwen proxy (deployed and local) for AI features.

133539.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

plugins.name: XRechnung XML Export
plugins.description: This plugin lets you export a ready-to-send XRechnung XML invoice from a structured Figma template (https://www.figma.com/community/file/1506387895617421047/xrechnung-invoice-template-for-freelancers-germany). It's built for freelancers and creatives working with German public-sector clients who need to submit invoices via portals like ZRE, OZG-RE, or PEPPOL. Just fill in the provided template, select the invoice frame, and run the plugin. It creates a valid .xml file with one click—no coding or formatting required.
plugins.tagline: Generate valid XRechnung XML invoices directly from Figma.

136943.name: XRechnung XML Export
136943.description: This plugin lets you export a ready-to-send XRechnung XML invoice from a structured Figma template (https://www.figma.com/community/file/1506387895617421047/xrechnung-invoice-template-for-freelancers-germany). It's built for freelancers and creatives working with German public-sector clients who need to submit invoices via portals like ZRE, OZG-RE, or PEPPOL. Just fill in the provided template, select the invoice frame, and run the plugin. It creates a valid .xml file with one click—no coding or formatting required.
136943.tagline: Generate valid XRechnung XML invoices directly from Figma.

plugins.name: Legoify
plugins.description:
Turn any image or frame into stunning BLOCK-style artwork with just one click. Legoify automatically generates a perfect grid of glassmorphic BLOCK bricks that overlay your design, creating that iconic brick aesthetic instantly. Perfect for mockups, presentations, or adding a playful dimension to your projects. Unleash your inner brick artist without the tedious manual work.


Features:


  1. One-click LEGO transformation
  2. Auto-adapts to any image size
  3. Realistic brick detail with studs
  4. Glassmorphic effect for modern appeal
  5. Non-destructive editing (original preserved)


From photos to UI designs—if you can select it, you can Legoify it!
plugins.tagline: One click brick or block effect generator

132089.name: Legoify
132089.description:
Turn any image or frame into stunning BLOCK-style artwork with just one click. Legoify automatically generates a perfect grid of glassmorphic BLOCK bricks that overlay your design, creating that iconic brick aesthetic instantly. Perfect for mockups, presentations, or adding a playful dimension to your projects. Unleash your inner brick artist without the tedious manual work.


Features:


  1. One-click LEGO transformation
  2. Auto-adapts to any image size
  3. Realistic brick detail with studs
  4. Glassmorphic effect for modern appeal
  5. Non-destructive editing (original preserved)


From photos to UI designs—if you can select it, you can Legoify it!
132089.tagline: One click brick or block effect generator

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: Lehuye
plugins.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.
plugins.tagline: 乐乎也数字盒子

plugins.name: Inked Colibri (RTC Converter and More)
plugins.description:
"Enhance your design workflow with a powerful plugin that converts Realtime Colors into Figma variables. Generate stunning color schemes, manage variables, and ensure contrast compliance with APCA standards. Features include interactive color pairing visualization, CSS variable export, and seamless theme synchronization."

https://youtu.be/H7M28NFhJ14


Core Features


Color Scheme Management

  1. Generate color schemes: monochromatic, analogous, complementary, and more.
  2. Randomize colors with support for multiple schemes.
  3. Enable real-time color updates and synchronization.
  4. Perform APCA contrast calculations and validation.


Matrix Generation

  1. Generate three matrix types: huge, compact, and slim.
  2. Create alpha-based color matrices.
  3. Visualize APCA contrast and validate thresholds.
  4. Customize thresholds and interactively visualize color pairings.


Variable Management

  1. Create and update color variables.
  2. Convert styles bi-directionally.
  3. Export variables as CSS.
  4. Generate and visualize swatches.
  5. Synchronize themes seamlessly.
plugins.tagline: Convert Realtime Colors to Variables, ensure APCA Accessibility, generate schemes, and more!

130268.name: Inked Colibri (RTC Converter and More)

Features include interactive color pairing visualization, CSS variable export, and seamless theme synchronization."

https://youtu.be/H7M28NFhJ14


Core Features


Color Scheme Management

  1. Generate color schemes: monochromatic, analogous, complementary, and more.
  2. Randomize colors with support for multiple schemes.
  3. Enable real-time color updates and synchronization.
  4. Perform APCA contrast calculations and validation.


Matrix Generation

  1. Generate three matrix types: huge, compact, and slim.
  2. Create alpha-based color matrices.
  3. Visualize APCA contrast and validate thresholds.
  4. Customize thresholds and interactively visualize color pairings.


Variable Management

  1. Create and update color variables.
  2. Convert styles bi-directionally.
  3. Export variables as CSS.
  4. Generate and visualize swatches.
  5. Synchronize themes seamlessly.

plugins.name: Import CSS shadows, create Figma styles
plugins.description:
I recently needed to create a Figma file from an existing website, and manually setting up effects took too long, so I created this plugin.


You can paste a CSS box-shadow, preview it, then create a style from all the shadow values.


You can also create matching variables. There is a small caveat: the Figma plugin API does not allow you to connect the style with the variable from within the plugin itself, meaning the style is disconnected from the variable. It still saves a tonne of time though!

accepted.name: Luis Ouriach
accepted.description:
Design & community @figmadesign. I write a newsletter, manage and host @8pxmag. 

Hot sauce on everything.

plugins.tagline: Copy, paste, generate

135698.name: Import CSS shadows, create Figma styles
135698.description:
I recently needed to create a Figma file from an existing website, and manually setting up effects took too long, so I created this plugin.


You can paste a CSS box-shadow, preview it, then create a style from all the shadow values.


You can also create matching variables. There is a small caveat: the Figma plugin API does not allow you to connect the style with the variable from within the plugin itself, meaning the style is disconnected from the variable. It still saves a tonne of time though!

plugins.name: Auto Layout Remover
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Remover helps you quickly clean up messy Figma files and make them easier to edit or prototype.


When to use it:

  1. You want to redesign freely. If your design is full of auto layouts and deeply nested frames, and you just want to move things around without dealing with layout constraints — this plugin flattens everything so you can edit with ease.
  2. You’re building an interactive prototype. Auto layouts often create layers and nesting that block or overlap each other. This plugin helps you clean the structure fast — so you can bring the right blocks to the top and avoid layout issues.


What it does:

  1. Turns off all auto layouts, keeping objects in place
  2. Ungroups frames and groups without visible styles (no fill, no stroke, or hidden)
  3. Deletes hidden layers and empty frames
  4. Leaves instances and styled frames untouched
  5. Makes your file flat, clean, and easy to work with
plugins.tagline: Remove all auto layouts, empty frames, and groups in one click.

134108.name: Auto Layout Remover
134108.description:
Auto Layout Remover helps you quickly clean up messy Figma files and make them easier to edit or prototype.


When to use it:

  1. You want to redesign freely. If your design is full of auto layouts and deeply nested frames, and you just want to move things around without dealing with layout constraints — this plugin flattens everything so you can edit with ease.
  2. You’re building an interactive prototype. Auto layouts often create layers and nesting that block or overlap each other. This plugin helps you clean the structure fast — so you can bring the right blocks to the top and avoid layout issues.


What it does:

  1. Turns off all auto layouts, keeping objects in place
  2. Ungroups frames and groups without visible styles (no fill, no stroke, or hidden)
  3. Deletes hidden layers and empty frames
  4. Leaves instances and styled frames untouched
  5. Makes your file flat, clean, and easy to work with
134108.tagline: Remove all auto layouts, empty frames, and groups in one click.

plugins.name: Promptus
plugins.description:
Promptus is a free Figma plugin that turns text or images into high-quality AI image prompts—all in just seconds, without leaving Figma.


⸻


Available tools

•Text-to-Prompt – type a brief and receive a detailed prompt

•Image-to-Prompt – upload an image and extract the underlying prompt

•One-Click Copy – copy the ready-to-use prompt wherever you need


⸻


Set up your Google Gemini API key in Promptus:


Open Promptus inside Figma.

Click the gear icon (Settings) in the top-right corner of the plugin panel.

Go to Google AI Studio.

Click “Sign in to Google AI Studio” and authenticate with your Google account.

In the top header, click the “Get API Key” button.

When prompted, click “Create API key”.

In the project pop-up, enter a project name (or select an existing one) and confirm.


Thank you for choosing Promptus! 🤩

👉 If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know — your feedback makes all the difference.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate detailed AI image prompts in Figma

134938.name: Promptus
134938.description:
Promptus is a free Figma plugin that turns text or images into high-quality AI image prompts—all in just seconds, without leaving Figma.


⸻


Available tools

•Text-to-Prompt – type a brief and receive a detailed prompt

•Image-to-Prompt – upload an image and extract the underlying prompt

•One-Click Copy – copy the ready-to-use prompt wherever you need


⸻


Set up your Google Gemini API key in Promptus:


Open Promptus inside Figma.

Click the gear icon (Settings) in the top-right corner of the plugin panel.

Go to Google AI Studio.

Click “Sign in to Google AI Studio” and authenticate with your Google account.

In the top header, click the “Get API Key” button.

When prompted, click “Create API key”.

In the project pop-up, enter a project name (or select an existing one) and confirm.


Thank you for choosing Promptus! 🤩

👉 If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know — your feedback makes all the difference.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin connects to Google Gemini API to generate image prompts.

134938.tagline: Instantly generate detailed AI image prompts in Figma

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
## 🎯 核心功能

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，分别应用最适合的行高倍数

- **统一行高模式**：为所有选中文本应用相同的行高倍数，精确控制排版节奏

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages


## 🔧 Default Settings

- **Single-line text**: 1.0× (compact layout)

- **Paragraph text**: 1.68× (golden ratio for comfortable reading)

- **Supports custom adjustment** from 0.1× to 5.0×


## 🆕 Update Log - v2.0

- Added smart detection for single-line vs. paragraph text

- Introduced uniform line height mode for consistent styling

- Improved UI for a more intuitive experience

- Custom line height range support (0.1×–5.0×)

- Line height calculation now uses floor rounding for pixel-perfect alignment

Update the rectangle ratio one-click adaptation specification

plugins.name: FigJsonizer
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you select any frame or component in Figma and instantly convert it into a clean, structured JSON object. It's perfect for devs building UI components, syncing data with code, or generating design specs.


No network needed, no fluff—just fast, reliable JSON export from your Figma canvas. Copy the data to clipboard and use it wherever your workflow takes you: React, Angular, JSON-based APIs—you name it.


Ideal for design-to-dev handoff, prototyping, and frontend engineering.
plugins.tagline: Generate and copy clean JSON from selected Figma frames.

plugins.name: Palettano - Color Palette Library
plugins.description:
🎨✨ Description with Emojis:

Palettano is your ultimate 🎯 design companion for color 🎨 perfection!

Explore a curated library of 500+ beautiful color palettes 🌈, ready to inspire your next project 💡.


🔍 Search palettes by mood, theme, or keyword

🖥️ Test palettes on real UI layouts before committing

📐 Preview colors in buttons, cards, backgrounds & more

🎯 Stay consistent with your brand or product design

⚡ Fast, smooth, and intuitive—built for creative minds!


Whether you're a designer 👩‍🎨, developer 👨‍💻, or color enthusiast 🎉, Palettano makes picking the perfect palette effortless and fun 🚀.
plugins.tagline: Access 500+ curated palettes and preview them live—design consistent, colorful interfaces

plugins.name: Auto Layout Checker
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Checker helps you maintain design consistency by identifying and converting elements that don't use Auto Layout. Perfect for cleaning up designs and ensuring layout consistency across your files.


🔍 Key Features:

• Scan entire pages or selected elements for missing Auto Layout

• One-click conversion of frames and groups to Auto Layout

• Clear visual feedback for converted elements

• Theme-aware interface that matches your Figma theme

• Quick navigation to elements through direct selection


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system cleanup and maintenance

• Legacy file modernization

• Team collaboration and consistency checks

• Quick Auto Layout implementation


💡 How to use:

1. Select elements to scan (or leave unselected to scan entire page)

2. Click "Scan" to find elements without Auto Layout

3. Click any element to navigate to it in your design

4. Use the "Convert" button to instantly apply Auto Layout


The plugin automatically applies sensible Auto Layout defaults:

• Vertical layout orientation

• 10px spacing between elements

• 10px padding on all sides

• Automatic sizing for both axes


Keep your designs maintainable and responsive with Auto Layout Checker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly find and convert elements missing Auto Layout, streamlining your design system consistency.
